settings.title: Your States Analysis

settings.title: Understanding Your Results
settings.content:
This analysis report provides insights into your current mental and emotional patterns, along with specific recommendations for which States products may help optimize your daily performance.

Remember: States are tools for optimization, not quick fixes. The best results come from consistent use alongside healthy lifestyle habits.

settings.title: Start Your States Journey
settings.subtitle: Based on your analysis, we recommend starting with the Box Set to discover which States work best for you.
